dcterms:creator: Angela Dai
Angel X Chang
Manolis Savva
Maciej Halber
Thomas Funkhouser
Matthias Nießner
dcterms:description: A large-scale RGB-D dataset that contains 1613 indoor scenes with geometry acquired by BundleFusion and images captured by iPad Air2.
dcterms:title: ScanNet

dcterms:creator: Chandan Yeshwanth
Yueh-Cheng Liu
Matthias Nießner
Angela Dai
dcterms:description: A high-fidelity dataset of 3D indoor scenes containing 280 indoor scenes with high-fidelity geometry acquired by the Faro Focus Premium laser scanner and high-resolution RGB images captured by iPhone 13 Pro and a DSLR camera with a fisheye lens.
dcterms:title: ScanNet++

dcterms:creator: Yiyi Liao
Jun Xie
Andreas Geiger
dcterms:description: A novel dataset and benchmarks for urban scene understanding in 2D and 3D, consisting of 300 suburban scenes with 320k images and 100k laser scans obtained through a mobile platform.
dcterms:title: KITTI-360
